name: The Soap
description: The Soap, not to be confused with Zoap, is a hybrid weed strain made from a genetic cross between Animal Mints and Kush Mints. The Soap is 19% THC, making this strain an ideal choice for beginner cannabis consumers. Leafly customers tell us The Soap effects include focus, feeling energized, and arousal. Medical marijuana patients often choose The Soap when dealing with symptoms associated with stress, anxiety, and depression. Bred by Seed Junky Genetics and Bernerâ€™s Cookies, The Soap features flavors like mint, pine and cheese. The dominant terpene of this strain is caryophyllene followed by limonene.
